subject: RE: [junit] initializing log4j via junit
msgSnippet: My JUnit tests that use log4j work just fine from ant, so it must be a configuration issue.  Are you using true log4j or Jakarta Commons Logging?  Are you 100%
messageBody:
My JUnit tests that use log4j work just fine from ant,
so it must be a configuration issue. Are you using
true log4j or Jakarta Commons Logging? Are you 100%
sure log4j.jar is in your build.xml's classpath?


Todd.
